attributes.action: Improve help for self employed who have had no help from government schemes
attributes.additional_details: I've tried to contact prime minister and chancellor regarding this, it doesn't affect me but several around me. It is not there choice to keep being told to stop working
attributes.background: Vote on helping the self employed who have been forgotten and are at risk of losing everything

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Extend income replacement schemes to those who don't currently qualify
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560845
